{ "title": "try メソッド の使い方", "date": 20191129184700, "tags": [ "ruby" ], "bodyContent": "## 使い方 ```ruby Object.try(method) ``` ## 例 どちらも同じ意味. ```ruby @person.try(:name) @person.name if @person ```", "bodyHtml": "

使い方

Object.try(method)

例

どちらも同じ意味.

@person.try(:name)
@person.name if @person
", "dir": "articles", "base": "20191129184700.json", "ext": ".json", "sourceBase": "20191129184700.md", "sourceExt": ".md" }
